name: Alliance Rider
text: You cannot vote on this agenda. Reveal the alliance ability of a random, unused faction and predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, gain that alliance ability; otherwise, discard it.

name: Ambassadors
text: Choose 1 non-home planet controlled by another player that contains their ground forces. Place 1 infantry from your reinforcements into coexistence on that planet and exhaust each planet in its system.
flavorText: The pageantry and endless bandying of crooked words with these uncertain allies was yet another of their schemes.

name: Cache
text: Exhaust 1 non-home, non-legendary planet you control to gain trade goods equal to its combined resource and influence values.
flavorText: The hoard of Lazax artifacts dated back to the dawn of the empire. The thought of selling these prized possessions cut him deeply, but Berekar knew they were the coin required to reclaim their home.

name: Flawless Strategy
window: After you exhaust your strategy card
text: Resolve the secondary ability of that strategy card; do not spend a command token to resolve that ability.

name: Flawless Strategy
window: After you exhaust your strategy card
text: Resolve the secondary ability of that strategy card; do not spend a command token to resolve that ability.

name: Flawless Strategy
window: After you exhaust your strategy card
text: Resolve the secondary ability of that strategy card; do not spend a command token to resolve that ability.

name: Flawless Strategy
window: After you exhaust your strategy card
text: Resolve the secondary ability of that strategy card; do not spend a command token to resolve that ability.

name: Opportunists
window: After you lose a space combat
text: Place 1 neutral cruiser and 2 neutral destroyers in that system. If it contains non-neutral ships, space combat is resolved in that system.
flavorText: The sensors of the lead ship exploded with an array of alarms and damage alerts as a fleet of unmarked ships poured forth from the wormhole. Reports be damned, these were no mere pirates.

name: Propaganda
window: After the first agenda of this agenda phase is revealed
text: Exhaust up to 2 of your non-home planets other than Mecatol Rex to place a number of infantry from your reinforcements on each of those planets equal to its influence value.
flavorText: The Federation anthem blared from the holoscreen as troops paraded across it. "They're doing their part. Are you? Join the Mobile Legion and save the galaxy!"

name: Rogues
text: Place 2 neutral fighters in a non-home system that does not contain your ships. If it contains non-neutral ships, space combat is resolved in that system.

name: Scavenged Fleet
window: After 1 or more of a player's ships are destroyed
text: Place matching neutral ships in a non-home system that contains no non-neutral ships.

name: Settlement
text: Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, place 2 infantry from your reinforcements on any non-home planet controlled by a player that voted for that outcome; if that planet contains that player's ground forces, place your infantry into coexistence.

name: Settlers
text: Choose 1 non-home planet controlled by another player that contains their ground forces. That player may allow you to place 2 infantry from your reinforcements into coexistence on that planet. If they do not, exhaust that planet and destroy up to 2 units on it.

name: Strategic Focus
text: Resolve the secondary ability of 1 readied or unchosen strategy card; do not spend a command token to resolve that ability.
flavorText: "With every imaginable incarnation of death at our doorsteps, they still reach for more," Rinn sighed. "We must remain focused. Steady."
